name: GAMER PC BUILD SIMULATOR
description:
The first real computer builder simulator in the app store!

Learn to build a computer and build your dream computer.

Now you can enjoy the PC building in virtual too! You can build your own PC just choose from the varied selection. Select the MB,PSU,CPU,GPU,RAM and storage which you want. If you run out of money you can play on your built personal computer and earn money to buy more expensive and better parts.

Build yourself a fantastic computer. There are many types of parts, but if you build it you can try it. Did you build the machine well? Will you test the game? If you play well you can get stronger components. if you are very skilled then you can build a perfect and powerful computer.
